oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Chet Atkins Interviewed by Bob Allen in 1985 Side One
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Bob Allen interviewing Chet Atkins. The recording takes place on 03-04-1985.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One - (0:06) -- Bob Allen begins by asking Chet Atkins about his home studio. Chet responds that his studio is 24-track. (2:00) -- Chet Atkins further discusses his studio gear and equipment. (3:12) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins what drum machine he currently owns. Chet mentions that he uses a LinnDrum. (4:54) -- Chet Atkins mentions he makes his own guitar pedals that he uses on other instruments. (6:04) -- Bob Allen asks about Chet's new album, "Stay Tuned." (7:42) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins about his personal soundboard. (9:26) -- Chet Atkins discusses the origins of his home studio. (10:18) -- Chet Atkins discusses that he owned a reverb unit that came from a Hammond organ. The creator of the Hammond organ owned a patent for spring reverb until the 50's. (12:02) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins whether he still owns anything from the old RCA studios. (14:30) -- Chet Atkins further discusses the equipment he's owned through the years. (16:36) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins about his previous album to "Stay Tuned." (17:29) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins about why he prefers recording with a 16-track. (18:20) -- Bob Allen asks how Chet Atkins records his guitar. Chet records through the soundboard. (19:14) -- Chet Atkins mentions that he is currently using a Peavey 130 Amplifier. (19:31) -- Chet Atkins discusses his preferred microphone arrangement when recording. (20:47) -- Chet mentions that he uses a Shure microphone for guitar. (22:04) -- Chet Atkins discusses recording with a plate microphone. (23:23) -- Chet Atkins mentions that he often uses a delay line to achieve the effect of tape echo on the guitar. (24:04) -- Bob Allen asks Chet Atkins about his personal practicing time in the studio. (27:10) -- Bob Allen asks whether Chet Atkins is currently interested in producing for others.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Atkins, Chet;
